title: NZXT
description: NZXT's brand colors include a distinctive purple (51007A), a vibrant lime (DBE800), a soft silver (D0D3D4), and a cool gray (7C878E). These colors are used to represent the brand's commitment to offering sleek, innovative design and cutting-edge products in the tech and gaming industry. Known from their official branding page and website, these colors reflect NZXT's bold yet modern technology aesthetics.
